pitch.cc: Phil Dumatrait may prefer to go after Shin-Soo Choo, whose OPS is .658 this season, with the four-seam fastball rather than facing Matt LaPorta, whose OPS is .754.
Dangerous count for Phil Dumatrait; Shin-Soo Choo is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .772 OPS against them this season and .662 against everything else.
Phil Dumatrait battled back from 3-0 to retire Shin-Soo Choo.
